alert.note: Alert for McIntosh; Muskogee; Okmulgee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 11:45PM CDT until September 24 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN MCINTOSH...EAST CENTRAL OKMULGEE AND NORTHWESTERN MUSKOGEE COUNTIES... At 1144 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Council Hill, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Checotah... Warner... Oktaha... Taft... Boynton... Council Hill... Rentiesville... Lake Eufaula State Park... Keefeton... Wainwright... Summit... Hitchita... Pierce... Eram... Onapa... This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 252 and 276. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
